&#3936;&#3906;&#4017;&#3962;&#3939;: to faint, to fall, to collapse
tumble down; to fall, to collapse, fell over, down, topple, tumble; collapse
&#3920;&#3964;&#3908;&#3942;: abandoning. {skyur la thongs} cast away; (imp. gtang) send, dispatch!/let go; let go/ throw. nang du thongs - permit him to enter
